column4: Hi. Anybody got framebuffer console working? I've got 'radeonfb' loaded but there's no /dev/fb* devices
what did I miss?
so. anybody here have a working framebuffer console?
yes.
anything you had to do other than load the kernel module?
I am sure somebody here has a working framebuffer.
ok great. when you do, let me know
ok.
seriously about the fb
ati radeon 9800
I _think_ it's worked in the past.... but I'm not sure :) I mean, usplash works
you may have to use another resolution and another vga mode.
does ATI card driver come with fb driver ?
not sure what you mean?
got that ?
ah, the fglrx driver doesn't come with a framebuffer driver, no
so use vga16fb
have you seen what I've written ?
Yeah --
and after 'modprobe vga16fb' I do now see an fb0 device
the framebuffer not always works without a reboot.
well, at least I know that i'm on the right track :)
